```{r}
jdwby <- read.csv("D:\\data\\sx_raw\\交调数据\\8月重点\\jd2018_08_16~21.csv",stringsAsFactors=F)
dim(jdwby)
```

```{r}
jdwbys <- handle_gather_forday(jdwby)
dim(jdwbys)
```

```{r}
names(jdwbys)
```

```{r}
table(jdwbys$day)
```

```{r}
x <- caculate_carsmean(jdwbys,c("province","day"))
x <- x[x$province %in% c("江苏省","天津市","河北省",
                         "安徽省","河南省","山东省"),]
y <- dcast(x,x$province~x$day)
kable(cbind(y[1],round(y[2:7])))
```

```{r}
ggplot(x,aes(x$province,as.factor(x$day),fill=x$Wmean))+

  xlab("省级行政区")+
```

```{r}
wbysd <- jdwbys[jdwbys$province=="山东省",]
dim(wbysd)
```

```{r}
wbysd17 <- jdwbys[jdwbys$day==17,]
dim(wbysd17)
wbysd21 <- jdwbys[jdwbys$day==21,]
dim(wbysd21)
```

```{r}
wbysd21s <- wbysd21[,c(1,12)]
x <- merge(wbysd17,wbysd21s,by="index")
dim(x)
names(x)[12] <- "cars17"
names(x)[31] <- "cars21"
```

```{r}
x$diff <- x$cars21-x$cars17
summary(x$diff)
```

```{r}
#t <- sbdeep(x$diff,4,0)
x$type <- ifelse(x$diff>0,1,0)
xsd <- x[x$province=="山东省",]
xsd <- xsd[,c(1,2,4,5,33)]
```

```{r}
geo_pointplot(xsd,na.rm = T,type=T)
```
